verses.text: All glory, laud, and honor To Thee, Redeemer, King, To whom the lips of children Made sweet hosannas ring.
The company of angels Are praising Thee on high, And mortal men and all things Created make reply.
To Thee, before Thy passion, They sang their hymns of praise; To Thee, now high exalted, Our melody we raise.

refrain.text: Thou art the King of Israel, Thou, David's royal Son, Who in the Lord's name comest, The King and Blessed One.
